mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.post_id, p.title, p.content, p.view_cnt, m.name AS member_name, COUNT(l.post_id) AS like_count FROM post p JOIN member_data m ON p.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN liketable l ON p.post_id = l.post_id AND l.good = 1 WHERE p.category_id IN ( SELECT c.category_id FROM category c WHERE c.board_id = #{boardId} ) GROUP BY p.post_id, p.title, p.content, p.view_cnt, m.name ORDER BY like_count DESC, view_cnt DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
